channel.title: Guide on Textverified Support
channel.description: Recent content in Guide on Textverified Support

item.title: Chrome Extension Walkthrough
item.description: We’re excited to annouce the release of our new Chrome Extension! This new free extension helps streamline your verification process by allowing you to start a verification on the website you’re trying to verify for. There is no need to switch between our website and other sites like you had to do before. Beyond the features that are already available for verifications (favoriting services, reusing numbers, doing another verification for the same service) we’ve added a few new quality of life improvements only available on our extension:

item.title: A Simple Guide to Proxies and VPNs
item.description: Discover how to use proxies & VPNs for online privacy: Learn what they are, their benefits, and how to set them up easily.

item.title: Cache, Cookies, and Local Storage: What You Need to Know
item.description: Explore how Cache, Cookies, & Local Storage can positively and negatively affect your privacy and discover steps to protect your digital footprint.

item.title: Is My IP Blacklisted?
item.description: Ever wonder why your verification did not work properly? In most cases, it is due to browser hygeine. Follow this guide to make sure your verifications work properly.
